title: Font Identification
content:
Can anybody identify or suggest how I can find out what the attached fonts are. Would really appreciate any help. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Westhall Partners Logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817173559/http:/typophile.com/files/Westhall%20Partners%20Logo.jpg) | 4.48 KB |
author: elsaunders

comments.content:
> Can anybody identify or suggest how I can find out what the attached fonts are

Sure. Post the question in the font id forum

[http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817173559/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

You're in General Discussion, where it specifically says

> All topics are welcome— **except font ID requests.**
